name: Gunpowder Cocktail - Chapter 1
description:
For a young man who has been abandoned by his father and not doing well, finding a bag filled with $500,000 can be very tempting. But if he gets that bag, will his life be as good as he imagined?​



Gunpowder Cocktail is a story about a young man who will experience major changes in his life after meeting a mob boss.

It does not have a straight flow and contains different paths that you can follow in its story. There are many choices you can make, a lot of hot girls you can f... *ahem* fall in love with and lots of villains you could face. Accordingly, it contains NTR and similar fetishes that you can experience as a result of the choices you make. So your choices will have a big impact on the story.

You want all the girls for yourself? Then play your cards right. Because it's a wolf's den.



You can win the hearts of all love interests and live a happy life...



You're in for a rough ride.



  • A dynamic story where the choices you make can have different consequences.
  • Over 5.000 Static Renders.
  • Over 50 Animations.
  • Free Roam and interactive gameplay elements.
  • Money and Inventory system.
  • Hidden rewards.
  • Minigames and more...
